imdb.plot outline: Adventures of Talia - A 13 year old quirky, slightly awkward AA girl who is still trying to find herself. She is mature for her age and a lot taller than most teens her age. Her parents are famous architects and encourage her unique personality and style. She has frizzy big hair with freckles on her nose. She wears very bright and unique clothing. She resembles "Pippi Long-stocking" her favorite TV character as well as the goofy Urkle. Talia is not concerned about "fitting in" as she's comfortable in her own skin. We follow Talia as she overcomes the challenges of being an ordinary teen while learning valuable lessons along the way.
imdb.title: Adventures of Talia
plot: _Adventures of Talia_ (qv) - A 13 year old quirky, slightly awkward AA girl who is still trying to find herself. She is mature for her age and a lot taller than most teens her age. Her parents are famous architects and encourage her unique personality and style. She has frizzy big hair with freckles on her nose. She wears very bright and unique clothing. She resembles "Pippi Long-stocking" her favorite TV character as well as the goofy Urkle. Talia is not concerned about "fitting in" as she's comfortable in her own skin. We follow Talia as she overcomes the challenges of being an ordinary teen while learning valuable lessons along the way.::Shashi Yejide
